name: f
summary:
Contains arranged music from Falcom games.

Games represented:
Tracks 1, 13: The Legend of Heroes V
Track 2: Zwei!!
Tracks 3, 10: Ys
Track 4: The Legend of Heroes III
Tracks 5, 8: Sorcerian
Track 6: The Legend of Xanadu II
Tracks 7, 12: Ys II
Track 9: The Legend of Xanadu
Track 11: Vantage Master V2
Track 14: Ys IV ~ Mask of the Sun
Track 15: The Legend of Heroes IV

Arranger credits:
Tracks 1, 13: 光沢(koutaq)
Track 2: LUV2
Tracks 3, 12: 溝口ゆうま
Tracks 4, 11: piper
Tracks 5, 8: NYA
Tracks 6, 9, 14: Jun.A
Tracks 7, 10, 15: Ume

More information may be found here:
http://www.ooedo.jp/presented/oemm-0073.htm
info:
• 作曲: Falcom Sound Team jdk
  • 别名: ef]　The Falcom game music　arrange collection
  • 发售日期: 2004-04-29
  • 价格: 1000 JPY
  • 播放时长: 47:12
  • 碟片数量: 1
